name: Dino Evolution (itch)
description:
In Dino Evolution you play as dinosaur starting 252 mio. years ago. You need to eat and drink as well as  dodge or fight enemy dinosaurs to survive and grow stronger.

Can you get your way all through the three mesozoic eras?

For controls you only need WASD (and a mouse to click on buttons).

This game is a submission to 7DRL.

I tried to apply basic concepts for my first roguelike, such as random level generation, ressource management, turn-based gameplay and permanent death.

Feedback is much appreciated!
